resources.string: Learn how to turn your exchange dream from scratch into reality and pave the way for your Au Pair Passport. Simply apply the PAP method to start your journey through Europe, just like my students are already doing.
I know your biggest dream is to explore the world out there, and
going on an exchange\nwill make your dreams\ncome true!

Are you tired of searching and not finding a way to travel without it costing you a fortune?\nDo you feel disappointed, chasing a dream that seems unattainable?\nHave you tried to go through the process alone but didn't get the expected results?
Get ready to learn the step-by-step process for the cheapest exchange in the world, allowing you to
live in Europe, with a visa + accommodation\nand money in your pocket
The guide to unlocking your exchange in Europe.

string-array.name: first_product_items
string-array.item: Approach message and call with the family

resources.string: The guide to unlocking your exchange in Europe.

string-array.name: third_product_items

resources.string: Hi future exchange student, let me introduce myself to you! I'm originally from Rio de Janeiro and I've always dreamed of traveling the world and I've also always been crazy about exchange research.I made my dream come true through the au pair exchange in 2021/2022 and traveled to more than 8 countries that year. And that's what I want for you!\n\nThe au pair will be the gateway to new opportunities, self-knowledge and especially the realization of dreams for you.My biggest purpose is to encourage people to achieve their dreams and embrace their own identity. I believe that each being is unique, which is why I seek to connect people with the best version of themselves.I'm more than ready to see you take off, I'll meet you on the journey.
I know you'll be the next to take off and send me messages like these:
Want to know if the mentoring is for you?

string-array.name: mentory_requirements
string-array.item: You are a woman aged between 18 and 28.
You feel lost in a sea of scattered information and want to easily find the necessary documentation?
You've always dreamed of going on an exchange and need to find a sustainable way for you?
You already tried alone and didnâ€™t have the expected results?

resources.string: The secret is that there's a proven and validated path by me and my students for you to get your long-awaited MATCH and embark in the coming months.

string-array.name: mentory_product_items
string-array.item: Mentoring countries: Austria ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡¹ Germany ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª Netherlands ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡± and France ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·
Support material for creating your profile on aupairworld
Templates and messages to send to host families
Learn how to negotiate benefits with your family
Find out how to choose the ideal family
How to open an international account
Study material for issuing a language certificate

string-array.name: mentory_product_bonuses
string-array.item: Save time you would spend finding the right information on your own
Have the security of receiving guidance from those who have already experienced the process
Have access to a mentor present who lives your exchange together with you
Learn how to travel cheaply around Europe
Have access to everything you need in one place
Being part of a community that is experiencing the same things as you

resources.string: The Au Pair Passport mentoring is divided into 7 modules of content for you to watch and apply right away.
No beating around the bush and straight to the point!
Get to know your mentor, understand why this exchange will change your life, and define your purpose.
Learn to plan your exchange practically, step by step, such as: languages, financial organization, choosing a family, and the best region for you to live in Europe.
Define the chosen country for boarding and understand more details about processes and visas.
It's time to create your perfect profile from scratch and prepare to close your match. You'll have access to ready-made message templates to approach families and learn how to behave in video calls.

You've closed the match, and now what? Don't worry, you've come this far, learn how to prepare for your departure lightly, organizing your documents, opening a bank account, and packing your suitcase with essential items.

You were born to soar, and I'm excited to see you up there. Get ready to buy your plane tickets, learn how everything works at the airport and immigration. Also, prepare for your arrival and adaptation in the new country.

We are the only mentoring program that cares about your well-being. I want to prepare you to live the most beautiful days of your life and also face challenges. In the self-care module, you are the focus as a whole.

resources.string: Au Pair Passport Map 2.0: The guide to unlocking your exchange in Europe.
The Map is divided into 3 modules that have 17 chapters, with all the practical step-by-step instructions so you can get your hands dirty and create your own exchange journey.
